markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Executioner Weapon Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=3329) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 64</row>

**Archetype** [Gray Gardener](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=124)

**Prerequisites**
[Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083); member of the Gray Gardeners

</column>

---

Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck. You become trained with the following weapons: [battle axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16), [falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18), [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21), and [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38). Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for these weapons.
name: Executioner Weapon Training
prerequisite: Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
prerequisite_markdown: [Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083); member of the Gray Gardeners
